column3: She settled back beside him. "It's 2:43:12 am, Case. Got a readout chipped into my optic nerve."

Max woke from the nightmare with a gasp, eyes flying open in the pitch-black room. She blinked twice and muffled a groan as the 02:43 timestamp appeared in her vision. "You've never even seen a real bear," she muttered.
column4: A Pale Light in the Black
